description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Buttons is the ultimate test of memory and concentration. Match the computers randomly generated button press sequence and level up. Have your Avatar cheer you on.  Strap on your virtual blindfold and try your luck with the dreaded blackout mode. Do your best and unlock challenges from the main game and follow your progress by checking out the stats menu. Become a Buttons top 100 champion!
description.short: Buttons is the ultimate test of memory and concentration. Match the computers randomly generated button press sequence and level up. Have your Avatar cheer you on.  Strap on your virtual blindfold and try your luck with the dreaded blackout mode. Do your best and unlock challenges from the main game and follow your progress by checking out the stats menu. Become a Buttons top 100 champion!
